income_messages:
From: j*******n@lendconsult.com
To: CRAWLER
Time: 2023-05-02 09:25:06
SUBJECT:                             PR
                            PROJECT FUNDING / JOINT VENTURE.
Good Day Sir/ Madam,
I am Jefferson Newton, I have businessmen in Gulf Region that want to
invest in a suitable economy in companies with potential for growth,
or Companies that have viable business plans / projects and need
funding, if your country bi-law allows foreign investors/investment.
The investors would like to receive 30% of the investment profit
annually under a Joint Venture.
Kindly reply via my private email: (
jefferson@lendconsult.com
) for more details.
Thanks
Jefferson Newton (Mr.)   
From: j*******n@lendconsult.com
To: ix48811@l******s.email
Time: 2023-05-02 12:57:21
SUBJECT: Re: PROJECT FUNDING / JOINT VENTURE.
Hello William,
Thanks for your email. I am facilitating a group of private investors 
whose interest is to make profit by investing in profitable ventures, 
both start ups and already existing businesses.
We are interested in investing anywhere given that the world has become 
a global village. Our interests vary from stocks and bonds, Hotel and 
tourism, alternative/ green energy, mining, school, mall, trade 
financing, oil and gas, agriculture, medicine and advancing new 
technologies. We will strongly consider any other proposal proffered by 
you provided that ROI is attractive.
Our investment offers range from (USD$1,000,000.00 - $1 Billion 
Dollars.), we are willing and open to discuss terms and conditions of 
partnership /or loan contract between us. This will be included in the 
MOU contract to be signed between us prior to releasing funds to you.
If you have a business idea or an existing business in need of 
expansion, kindly send a detailed proposal for my perusal and 
consideration for financing. I would appreciate it if you can clearly 
outline the regular market trends in your chosen area of business, our 
likely gains and constraints and any other information you deem 
necessary to enable us to have a clear picture to inform our decision.
We can provide funding by way of a Low interest loan program (LILP) or 
Partnership /Joint Venture (JV).
Kindly provide more information about yourself, your business and full 
contact information and address for documentation and easier 
communication.
Sincerely,‎
Jefferson Newton (Mr.)
From: j*******n@lendconsult.com
To: ix48811@l******s.email
Time: 2023-05-03 22:44:07
SUBJECT: Re: PROJECT FUNDING / JOINT VENTURE.
Hello William.
It is a pleasure to be in contact with you and I wouldn't want us to do 
emails back and forth without making real progress especially when you 
have refused to disclose your identity. I hope you understand we cannot 
close this deal without knowing whom we are negotiating with.
I will  liaise with you on the procedure of applying for and receiving a 
potential loan. Given the  nature of your project, we can only decide on 
the level of our participation/ finance after we receive an executive 
summary of your project. In order not to waste our times, I will give 
you  some basic information on the general outline of the process.
The principle terms for the loan procedure are as follows: -
Securitization:         Via Insurance Bond Guarantee (cost 3% of loan 
amount and can be agreed to be deducted from loan prior to disbursement 
- see below)
Est. Length of Loan:                         10 years + (TBC)
Moratorium on Interest:               0 to 36 months possible
Repayment:                                 At end of loan period
(which can be extended by mutual agreement) or pay back early the amount
of the Loan in minimum tranches of USD 500,000 without penalty.
Interest Rate:                                    2.5% per annum
Legal Jurisdiction:                             International
Regarding the Insurance Bond Guarantee - no other collateral, personal 
guarantee of share pledge is required. The Insurance Bond is put in 
place as the surety / security for the loan. In the instance (after 
"default notification" and "failure to remedy") that a loan could 
potentially fully default the Insurance Bond is triggered in favor of 
the lender and pays back the majority of their loan. For the balance 
there is then a company valuation done on the Borrowers and Lender can 
trigger step-in rights for a proportion of the company shares. But this 
is a last resort always. The one off cost is 3% of the loan and is 
deducted from the loan amount and not required to be provided separately 
by the Borrower.
As with all lenders there are some fees ahead of drawdown that cannot be 
avoided or deferred. These will be outlined in the lenders Procedure 
document and indicatively they will be: -
o             Flat fee for legal and administration following loan 
approval at Board Level.
o             Variable fee for completion and closing costs    To be 
confirmed
Kindly get back to me with the executive summary of your proposal if 
these terms fit into the purview of your search for viable financing so 
we can proceed with the loan process.
I look forward to discussing with you further.
Best regards,
Jeff Newton
From: j*******n@lendconsult.com
To: ix48811@l******s.email
Time: 2023-05-04 21:42:49
SUBJECT: Re: PROJECT FUNDING / JOINT VENTURE.
Hello William,
Can I have a number to reach you so we can talk?
Regards,
Jeff.
outbound_messages:
From: ix48811@l******s.email
To: j*******n@lendconsult.com
Time: 2023-05-02 09:25:11
SUBJECT: Re:                             PR
Hello Jefferson Newton,
Thank you for reaching out to me. I am interested in learning more about your project funding joint venture. Can you provide me with more information about the type of companies you are looking to invest in and the potential for growth? Also, what is the process for foreign investors in my country? 
Looking forward to hearing back from you.
Best regards.
Best wishes,
William
From: ix48811@l******s.email
To: j*******n@lendconsult.com
Time: 2023-05-02 13:24:52
SUBJECT: Re: PROJECT FUNDING / JOINT VENTURE.
Hello Jefferson,
Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your interest in investing in profitable ventures. Can you please provide more information about your group of private investors? How many investors are in the group and what is the average investment amount per investor?
I have a business idea that I believe has the potential for high ROI. It is in the technology industry and I can provide a detailed proposal for your perusal. Can you please provide more information about the Low interest loan program LILP and Joint Venture JV? What are the terms and conditions for each program?
I prefer not to disclose my personal information at this time. However, I can provide more information about my business and its market trends. Please let me know if this is sufficient.
Thank you again for your interest and I look forward to hearing back from you.
Best wishes,
William
From: ix48811@l******s.email
To: j*******n@lendconsult.com
Time: 2023-05-03 23:12:17
SUBJECT: Re: PROJECT FUNDING / JOINT VENTURE.
Hello Jeff,
Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your interest in my project and your willingness to provide potential financing. However, before we proceed any further, I would like to know more about your company and your experience in providing loans. Can you please provide me with some background information?
Also, I would like to clarify the fees that you mentioned. Can you please explain in more detail what the flat fee for legal and following loan approval at Board Level entails? And what is the variable fee for completion and closing costs?
Once I have a better understanding of these details, I will be happy to provide you with an executive summary of my project.
Best wishes,
William
From: ix48811@l******s.email
To: j*******n@lendconsult.com
Time: 2023-05-04 22:12:23
SUBJECT: Re: PROJECT FUNDING / JOINT VENTURE.
Hello Jeff,
Thank you for reaching out. May I know what this call is regarding? I would like to have more information before sharing my contact number.
Best wishes,
William
